headline: 2 Stock-Split AI Stocks to Buy Before They Soar in 2025, According to Wall Street
summary: Stock splits not only make a company's stock more affordable, but can also cue investors in to competitively advantaged businesses.  Last year, Super Micro Computer (NASDAQ: SMCI) and Arista Networks (NYSE: ANET) split their stocks to make shares accessible to more investors.  Super Micro completed its 10-for-1 split on Oct. 1, and Arista completed its 4-for-1 split on Dec. 4.
